metadata.title: CVE-2022-1789 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
With shadow paging enabled, the INVPCID instruction results in a call tokvm_mmu_invpcid_gva. If INVPCID is executed with CR0.PG=0, the invlpgcallback is not set and the result is a NULL pointer dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1789` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
